itunes:title: #97: Identifying Codependent Patterns in Your Everyday Life
title: #97: Identifying Codependent Patterns in Your Everyday Life
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: We can be codependent in many other areas outside of our interpersonal relationships.  In this episode, we will break down what that may look like.    RESOURCES MENTIONED     Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to...
itunes:summary:
We can be codependent in many other areas outside of our interpersonal relationships. 

In this episode, we will break down what that may look like. 

 

RESOURCES MENTIONED

  • The Healed and Loved Woman Membership
  • Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to 832-219-7815
  • Get our free download - The 5 Step Roadmap to Heal Love Addiction
  • Apply to work together in the Recovery School  - Click here to pre-apply!
  • Learn that YOU ARE WORTHY  - Enroll in You Are Worthy here
